titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to revise certain accreditation requirements applied under the Medicare program.
SAFE Act of 2016
Strengthening Accreditation For Everyone Act of 2016
SAFE Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Strengthening Accreditation For Everyone Act of 2016 or the SAFE Act of 2016
This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the factors that the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services must consider with respect to determining whether certain national accreditation demonstrates a provider's compliance with applicable requirements of the Medicare program.
